import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Modal,Button,Row,Col,Form, FormGroup, FormLabel, FormControl } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Department } from './Department'; export class AddDepModal extends Component { handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault(); fetch("http://localhost:52396/api/department",{method:'POST', headers:{ 'Accept':'application/json', 'Content-Type':'application/json' }, body:JSON.stringify({ DepartmentID:null, DepartmentName: e.target.DepartmentName.value }) }) } render() { return ( Add Department
Department Name
) } }
